verses.verse: וּכְכַלּ֤וֹת <S%H3615><s%> had made an end שְׁלֹמֹה֙ <S%H8010><s%> Now when Solomon לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֔ל <S%H6419><s%> of praying וְהָאֵ֗שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire יָֽרְדָה֙ <S%H3381><s%> came down מֵֽהַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וַתֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> and consumed הָעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offering וְהַזְּבָחִ֑ים <S%H2077><s%> and the sacrifices וּכְב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> filled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> the house

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָֽכְלוּ֙ <S%H3201><s%> could הַכֹּ֣הֲנִ֔ים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> not enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> into בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> had filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> because the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S

וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <S%H3605><s%> All בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> And when all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רֹאִים֙ <S%H7200><s%> saw בְּרֶ֣דֶת <S%H3381><s%> came down הָאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> how the fire וּכְב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> upon the house וַיִּכְרְעוּ֩ <S%H3766><s%> they bowed אַפַּ֨יִם <S%H639><s%> themselves with their faces אַ֤רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the ground עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הָרִֽצְפָה֙ <S%H7531><s%> upon the pavement וַיִּֽשְׁתַּֽחֲו֔וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped וְהוֹד֤וֹת <S%H3034><s%> and praised לַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Truly ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [saying] For [he is] good כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> truly לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּֽוֹ׃ <S%H2617><s%> for his mercy

וְהַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Then the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> and all the people זֹבְחִ֥ים <S%H2076><s%> offered זֶ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifices לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס

וַיִּזְבַּ֞ח <S%H2076><s%> offered הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> And king שְׁלֹמֹה֮ <S%H8010><s%> Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice הַבָּקָ֗ר <S%H1241><s%> oxen עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> of twenty וּשְׁנַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8147><s%> and two אֶ֔לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וְצֹ֕אן <S%H6629><s%> sheep מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> and an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אָ֑לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand וַֽיַּחְנְכוּ֙ <S%H2596><s%> dedicated אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> so the king וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> and all the people

וְהַכֹּהֲנִ֞ים <S%H3548><s%> And the priests עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at מִשְׁמְרוֹתָ֣ם <S%H4931><s%> on their offices עֹמְדִ֗ים <S%H5975><s%> waited וְהַלְוִיִּ֞ם <S%H3881><s%> the Levites בִּכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> also with instruments שִׁ֤יר <S%H7892><s%> of musick יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֜ה <S%H6213><s%> had made דָּוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> which David הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king לְהֹד֤וֹת <S%H3034><s%> to praise לַיהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for לְעוֹלָ֣ם <S%H5769><s%> [endureth] for ever חַסְדּ֔וֹ <S%H2617><s%> because his mercy בְּהַלֵּ֥ל <S%H1984><s%> praised דָּוִ֖יד <S%H1732><s%> when David בְּיָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> by their ministry וְהַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <S%H3548><s%> and the priests [מַחֲצֹצְרִים כ] (מַחְצְרִ֣ים <S%H2690><s%> blow ק) נֶגְדָּ֔ם <S%H5048><s%> the other וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> before them and all Israel עֹמְדִֽים׃ <S%H5975><s%> stood ס

וַיְקַדֵּ֣שׁ <S%H6942><s%> hallowed שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> Moreover Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> the middle הֶֽחָצֵר֙ <S%H2691><s%> of the court אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> that [was] before בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because עָ֤שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> for there he offered שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> there הָֽעֹל֔וֹת <S%H5930><s%> burnt offerings וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> חֶלְבֵ֣י <S%H2459><s%> and the fat הַשְּׁלָמִ֑ים <S%H8002><s%> of the peace offerings כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because מִזְבַּ֤ח <S%H4196><s%> altar הַנְּחֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <S%H5178><s%> because the brasen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> had made שְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> which Solomon לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> was not יָכ֗וֹל <S%H3201><s%> was not able לְהָכִ֛יל <S%H3557><s%> to receive אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֹלָ֥ה <S%H5930><s%> the burnt offerings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּנְחָ֖ה <S%H4503><s%> and the meat offerings וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲלָבִֽים׃ <S%H2459><s%> and the fat

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> kept שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הֶ֠חָג <S%H2282><s%> the feast בָּעֵ֨ת <S%H6256><s%> Also at the same time הַהִ֜יא <S%H1931><s%> he שִׁבְעַ֤ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִים֙ <S%H3117><s%> days וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <S%H3478><s%> and all Israel עִמּ֔וֹ <S%H5973><s%> with קָהָ֖ל <S%H6951><s%> congregation גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> great מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> with him a very מִלְּב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> from the entering in חֲמָ֖ת <S%H2574><s%> of Hamath עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against נַ֥חַל <S%H5158><s%> unto the river מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֛וּ <S%H6213><s%> they made בַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֖י <S%H8066><s%> And in the eighth עֲצָ֑רֶת <S%H6116><s%> a solemn assembly כִּ֣י ׀ <S%H3588><s%> for חֲנֻכַּ֣ת <S%H2598><s%> the dedication הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <S%H4196><s%> of the altar עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> for they kept שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days וְהֶחָ֖ג <S%H2282><s%> and the feast שִׁבְעַ֥ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> days

וּבְי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> and twentieth וּשְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <S%H7969><s%> And on the three לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> month הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> of the seventh שִׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> the people לְאָהֳלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H168><s%> into their tents שְׂמֵחִים֙ <S%H8056><s%> glad וְט֣וֹבֵי <S%H2896><s%> and merry לֵ֔ב <S%H3820><s%> in heart עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> because הַטּוֹבָ֗ה <S%H2896><s%> for the goodness אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֤ה <S%H6213><s%> had shewed יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD לְדָוִ֣יד <S%H1732><s%> unto David וְלִשְׁלֹמֹ֔ה <S%H8010><s%> and to Solomon וּלְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> and to Israel עַמּֽוֹ׃ <S%H5971><s%> his people

וַיְכַ֧ל <S%H3615><s%> finished שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <S%H8010><s%> Thus Solomon אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַבָּ֜א <S%H935><s%> and all that came עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart שְׁלֹמֹ֗ה <S%H8010><s%> into Solomon's לַעֲשׂ֧וֹת <S%H6213><s%> to make בְּבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וּבְבֵית֖וֹ <S%H1004><s%> and in his own house הִצְלִֽיחַ׃ <S%H6743><s%> he prosperously effected פ

וַיֵּרָ֧א <S%H7200><s%> appeared יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <S%H8010><s%> to Solomon בַּלָּ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֗וֹ שָׁמַ֙עְתִּי֙ <S%H8085><s%> unto him I have heard אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תְּפִלָּתֶ֔ךָ <S%H8605><s%> thy prayer וּבָחַ֜רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> and have chosen בַּמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> this place הַזֶּ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> this לִ֖י לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to myself for an house זָֽבַח׃ <S%H2077><s%> of sacrifice

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> If אֶֽעֱצֹ֤ר <S%H6113><s%> I shut up הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> heaven וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no יִהְיֶ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> become מָטָ֔ר <S%H4306><s%> that there be no rain וְהֵן־ <S%H2005><s%> if אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> or if I command עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and חָגָ֖ב <S%H2284><s%> the locusts לֶאֱכ֣וֹל <S%H398><s%> to devour הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if אֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> or if I send דֶּ֖בֶר <S%H1698><s%> pestilence בְּעַמִּֽי׃ <S%H5971><s%> among my people

וְיִכָּנְע֨וּ <S%H3665><s%> shall humble עַמִּ֜י <S%H5971><s%> If my people אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> who נִֽקְרָא־ <S%H7121><s%> which are called שְׁמִ֣י <S%H8034><s%> by my name עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> and וְיִֽתְפַּֽלְלוּ֙ <S%H6419><s%> themselves and pray וִֽיבַקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H1245><s%> and seek פָנַ֔י <S%H6440><s%> my face וְיָשֻׁ֖בוּ <S%H7725><s%> and turn מִדַּרְכֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H1870><s%> ways הָרָעִ֑ים <S%H7451><s%> from their wicked וַאֲנִי֙ <S%H589><s%> I אֶשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> then will I hear מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> from heaven וְאֶסְלַח֙ <S%H5545><s%> and will forgive לְחַטָּאתָ֔ם <S%H2403><s%> their sin וְאֶרְפָּ֖א <S%H7495><s%> and will heal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָֽם׃ <S%H776><s%> their land

עַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now עֵינַי֙ <S%H5869><s%> Now mine eyes יִהְי֣וּ <S%H1961><s%> become פְתֻח֔וֹת <S%H6605><s%> shall be open וְאָזְנַ֖י <S%H241><s%> and mine ears קַשֻּׁב֑וֹת <S%H7183><s%> attent לִתְפִלַּ֖ת <S%H8605><s%> unto the prayer הַמָּק֥וֹם <S%H4725><s%> [that is made] in this place הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> now בָּחַ֤רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> For now have I chosen וְהִקְדַּ֙שְׁתִּי֙ <S%H6942><s%> and sanctified אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבַּ֣יִת <S%H1004><s%> this house הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this לִהְיוֹת־ <S%H1961><s%> become שְׁמִ֥י <S%H8034><s%> that my name שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> may be there עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> may be there for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever וְהָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> become עֵינַ֧י <S%H5869><s%> and mine eyes וְלִבִּ֛י <S%H3820><s%> and mine heart שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> will be there כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> shall be there הַיָּמִֽים׃ <S%H3117><s%> shall be there perpetually
